conbody.p: Agencies shall impose and collect civil penalties pursuant to the provisions of the Program Fraud and Civil Remedies Act,31 U.S.C.3803 (except subsection(c)), 3804-3808, and 3812, insofar as the provisions therein are not inconsistent with the requirements of this subpart.
